name: PLUTONIUM
description: PLUTONIUM: Distorted Shelter is a 2D adventure game about a major event that took place in a highly developed city state called Plutonium.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 700 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
